UIFrameworkMobile/PlatformAPI/Gradientfill.cs

00001 //--------------------------------------------------------------------- 
00002 //THIS CODE AND INFORMATION ARE PROVIDED AS IS WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY 
00003 //KIND, EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE 
00004 //IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND/OR FITNESS FOR A 
00005 //PARTICULAR PURPOSE.

00007 
00008 using System;
00009 using System.Collections.Generic;
00010 using System.Text;
00011 using System.Windows.Forms;
00012 using System.Drawing;
00013 
00014 namespace Microsoft.Drawing
00015 {
00016     public sealed class GradientFill
00017     {
00018         // This method wraps the PInvoke to GradientFill.
00019         // Parmeters:
00020         //  gr - The Graphics object we are filling
00021         //  rc - The rectangle to fill
00022         //  startColor - The starting color for the fill
00023         //  endColor - The ending color for the fill
00024         //  fillDir - The direction to fill
00025         //
00026         // Returns true if the call to GradientFill succeeded; false
00027         // otherwise.
00028         public static bool Fill(
00029             Graphics gr,
00030             Rectangle rc,
00031             Color startColor, Color endColor,
00032             FillDirection fillDir)
00033         {
00034 
00035             // Initialize the data to be used in the call to GradientFill.
00036             TRIVERTEX[] tva = new TRIVERTEX[2];
00037             tva[0] = new TRIVERTEX(rc.X, rc.Y, startColor);
00038             tva[1] = new TRIVERTEX(rc.Right, rc.Bottom, endColor);
00039             GRADIENT_RECT[] gra = new GRADIENT_RECT[] {
00040                                      new GRADIENT_RECT(0, 1)};
00041 
00042             // Get the hDC from the Graphics object.
00043             IntPtr hdc = gr.GetHdc();
00044 
00045             // PInvoke to GradientFill.
00046             bool b;
00047 
00048             b = Win32Helper.GradientFill(
00049                     hdc,
00050                     tva,
00051                     (uint)tva.Length,
00052                     gra,
00053                     (uint)gra.Length,
00054                     (uint)fillDir);
00055             System.Diagnostics.Debug.Assert(b, string.Format(
00056                 "GradientFill failed: {0}",
00057                 System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.GetLastWin32Error()));
00058 
00059             // Release the hDC from the Graphics object.
00060             gr.ReleaseHdc(hdc);
00061 
00062             return b;
00063         }
00064 
00065       
00066     }
00067 
00068     // The direction to the GradientFill will follow
00069     public enum FillDirection
00070     {
00071         //
00072         // The fill goes horizontally
00073         //
00074         LeftToRight = Win32Helper.GRADIENT_FILL_RECT_H,
00075         //
00076         // The fill goes vertically
00077         //
00078         TopToBottom = Win32Helper.GRADIENT_FILL_RECT_V
00079     }
00080 
00081   
00082 }
